pageContext.claim: “[Comey, McCabe, et al.] started an investigation based on no crime.”
pageContext.analysis: The investigation began as a look into possible Russian interference in the 2016 election and then was expanded to include any coordination between the Trump campaign and Russian officials. The attorney general's summary of the Mueller report unequivocally states Russia did attempt to meddle in the 2016 election and the special counsel indicted several Russian officials as conspirators in that effort.
